original_text: He went across to him. He poured oil and wine on the places where he was bleeding. Then he tied those places with clean cloths. After that, he put the man on his own donkey to carry him. They arrived at a small hotel. He took the man in there and he was kind to him.
korean_text: 가까이 가서 기름과 포도주를 그 상처에 붓고 싸매고 자기 짐승에 태워 주막으로 데리고 가서 돌보아 주니라

sentences.original_text: He poured oil and wine on the places where he was bleeding.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 피가 나는 곳에 기름과 포도주를 부었다.

sentences.original_text: Then he tied those places with clean cloths.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 깨끗한 천으로 그 곳을 동여맸다.

sentences.original_text: After that, he put the man on his own donkey to carry him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그 사람을 자신의 나귀에 태워서 데려갔다.

sentences.original_text: They arrived at a small hotel.
He took the man in there and he was kind to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 사람을 그곳으로 데려가서 친절을 베풀었다.
